bgDescription: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.
description: Allows the selected Resonators in the team to reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Allows the selected Resonators in the team to reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
